TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but they blow up.

I wish for the .15 update.

Granted, but it instantly breaks the entire universe due to sheer awesomeness.

I wish for MORE LIQUID FUEL!

Granted, but it instantly breaks the entire universe due to sheer awesomeness.

I wish for MORE LIQUID FUEL!

Granted, but it is bio fuel, fresh from the manure farm.

I wish I could decide what parts I want for my new computer

I wish I could decide what parts I want for my new computer

You can now choose between all computer parts from 1256 to 1984...

I wish for Radion to know that I\'m not disowned by the Mirialans

Granted, but he now seems to think they\'re trying to smother you with gunfire instead.

I wish for a cookie.

You are a cookie now.

Imagine a wish to corrupt for yourself.

Granted, but you just corrupted yourself.

I wish for a game that i can play for more than a year without getting bored.

Granted, but you just corrupted yourself.

I wish for a game that i can play for more than a year without getting bored.

Granted, but you play so much that your eyes fall out.

I wish for a piece of chicken.

Granted, but it is green and old.

I wish for EVERYTHING.

You have everything in the universe around you, so you turn into a black hole.

I wish for nothing

Granted, but then I give you something.

I wish for Mars to be habitable.

Granted, it is now habitable for non-carbon based lifeforms.

I wish for there to be an affordable cake that comes with no fat, no calories, no cholesterol, or anything which can bring on negative health issues, while still retaining all of the frosting and bread and sugar with the same great taste.

Granted, but then it has posion in it.

I wish for a dog and a puppy that are harmless.

Granted, but it dies after thirty minutes.

I wish for a space elevator that doesn\'t break.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=11247.0 ;P

I wish for a 1m or .5m high 3m fuel tank

Granted, but it is prone to exploding randomly.

I wish for sleep.

Granted, but you never wake up... ever.

i wish for the best headphone which have the greatest sound quality of all time, are indestructible (nuclear blast tested) and impossible to be stolen from me. i have 18 guards within 30 meters of them at all time, and they will never attack me, even at my own request. they will all take a bullet for me. if one dies, it is imediately replaced, with literally 1000\'s of people waiting in the wings ( about 10 meters away)

Headphones are nuclear blast tested, eeh, you not, right? Well here comes the tsar bomba Mk2 blast test...

I wish for being out of range

Granted, but then someone teleports you back in range. =P Remote teleport.

I wish for a life support system that can withstand everything up to and including the end of time.

Granted, but its life support for a silicon-based organism, not carbon-based, as you are.

I wish I could materialize candy out of thin air.

Granted, but you get fat and die.

I wish for PowerPC to support KSP.

Granted, but then you lose your KSP purchase to a massive EMP.

I wish for my computer not to explode when I test a prototype aircraft carrier.

Granted, but the same EMP destroys the power plant, causing your computer to turn off.

I wish for a cookie.

Granted, but you get a low definition cookie:

I wish for a high-definition cake to add to my high-definition cookie collection.

Granted, but it got lost in the interwebs somewhere.

I wish for a high-definition picture of Bose-Einstein condensate.
